name: 曹筱玥
objective:
年來，在世博和花博兩大活動的帶動下，讓跨領域整合的「展示科技」成為新的研究焦點；新型態的展示手法，可以被應用在博物館及展場、商業空間、互動式機台、行銷活動和數位藝術。依照需求的不同，可以把展示科技分成『會場環境』和『觀眾體驗』兩類，前者就像是基礎建設、活動系統和周邊系統，而後者則是為觀眾創造全新體驗。而本課程則是為了掌握產業界相關的技術新知、學術界的專業研究與藝文界的脈動，本課程將廣邀展示科技的專家或學者，參與專題討論，就展場設計、互動技術、視覺呈現等面向，翻轉你與展示物的關係，體現創意展現的軟實力。
The promotion of Expo and Flora Expo in recent years makes the display technology a new focus in study. New pattern of display techniques can be applied to museum, exhibition, commercial space, interactive machinery, marketing and digital art. Depending on different needs, the Display Technology can be divided into two categories, which are "the environment of exhibition" and "the experience of audience". The former is like fundamental constructions, movable system, and peripheral system; the latter is like building a new and fresh experience for the audience. To understand science and technological information from business field, researches from academic field and issues from arts field, this course should be invited the expertise and scholars to participate the topic discussion.
